briefdescription.para: CRS of destination coordinate reference system.

detaileddescription.para: Automatically loaded from project on QgsProject::readProject

briefdescription.para: Geographical coordinates of the rectangle that should be rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The actual visible extent used for rendering could be slightly different since the given extent may be expanded in order to fit the aspect ratio of output size. Use QgsQuickMapSettings::visibleExtent to get the resulting extent.
Automatically loaded from project on QgsProject::readProject

briefdescription.para: Set list of layers for map rendering.

detaileddescription.para: The layers must be registered in QgsProject. The layers are stored in the reverse order of how they are rendered (layer with index 0 will be on top)
Any non-spatial layers will be automatically stripped from the list (since they cannot be rendered!). Not loaded automatically from the associated project

briefdescription.para: Returns the distance in geographical coordinates that equals to one pixel in the map.
Output DPI used for conversion between real world units (e.g.

detaileddescription.para: mm) and pixels
Automatically loaded from project on QgsProject::readProject

briefdescription.para: The size of the resulting map image.

detaileddescription.para: Automatically loaded from project on QgsProject::readProject

briefdescription.para: A project property should be used as a primary source of project all other components in the application.

detaileddescription.para: QgsProject should be attached to QgsQuickMapSettings before it is read (QgsProject::read)
When project is read, map settings (CRS, extent, ...) are automatically set from its DOM.

briefdescription.para: The rotation of the resulting map image, in degrees clockwise.

detaileddescription.para: Map canvas rotation support is not implemented, 0 is used

briefdescription.para: Returns the actual extent derived from requested extent that takes takes output image size into account.
Create new map settings.
Convert a map coordinate to screen pixel coordinates.

simplesect.para: A coordinate in pixel / screen space

briefdescription.para: returns CRS of destination coordinate reference system
Returns geographical coordinates of the rectangle that should be rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The actual visible extent used for rendering could be slightly different since the given extent may be expanded in order to fit the aspect ratio of output size. Use visibleExtent() to get the resulting extent.

briefdescription.para: Gets list of layers for map rendering The layers are stored in the reverse order of how they are rendered (layer with index 0 will be on top)
Clone map settings.

briefdescription.para: The rotation of the resulting map image, in degrees clockwise.

briefdescription.para: Convert a screen coordinate to a map coordinate.

parameterdescription.para: A coordinate in pixel / screen coordinates

briefdescription.para: Move current map extent to have center point defined by center.
sets destination coordinate reference system
Set coordinates of the rectangle which should be rendered.

detaileddescription.para: The actual visible extent used for rendering could be slightly different since the given extent may be expanded in order to fit the aspect ratio of output size. Use visibleExtent() to get the resulting extent.

briefdescription.para: Set list of layers for map rendering.

detaileddescription.para: The layers must be registered in QgsProject. The layers are stored in the reverse order of how they are rendered (layer with index 0 will be on top)

simplesect.para: Any non-spatial layers will be automatically stripped from the list (since they cannot be rendered!).

briefdescription.para: Sets DPI used for conversion between real world units (e.g. mm) and pixels.

briefdescription.para: The rotation of the resulting map image, in degrees clockwise.

briefdescription.para: Sets the coordinate transform context, which stores various information regarding which datum transforms should be used when transforming points from a source to destination coordinate reference system.

Returns the coordinate transform context, which stores various information regarding which datum transforms should be used when transforming points from a source to destination coordinate reference system.
Returns the actual extent derived from requested extent that takes takes output image size into account.

Read map canvas settings stored in a QGIS project file.
The QgsQuickMapSettings class encapsulates QgsMapSettings class to offer settings of configuration of map rendering via QML properties.

detaileddescription.para: On top of QgsMapSettings functionality, when QgsProject is attached, it automatically loads its default settings from the project. QgsProject should be attached before it is read.
